text:
Hi,

We have implemented a custom multipart/form-data processor, in order to handle 
image uploading. 

When we are reading data from a ServletInputStream, after reading the 
multipart/form-data header (filename & content-type), the number of read 
characters is "-1". That's wrong, ... If we skip this spurious data, we can 
read more info, but it seems to be wrong, since we cannot recover correctly the 
file.

The same application under Tomcat 3.2.3, or Catalina 4.0.1 with HttpConnector 
works fine.
creator: drodriguez@divisait.com
pier@betaversion.org
text:
This has been fixed in CVS and available from the nightly builds since few 
weeks...
